meanings.definition: A type of comedy performance where a comedian performs standing up.
meanings.sent1: I went to see some standups at the comedy club last night.
meanings.sent2: Standups always make me laugh with their jokes and stories.
meanings.sent3: The standups had the audience in stitches with their hilarious jokes.
meanings.sent4: Watching standups perform is like taking a joy ride through laughter.
meanings.sent5: The standups' performance was so entertaining that I couldn't stop smiling.

meanings.definition: A person who stands up for something or someone.
meanings.sent1: She is known as a brave standup who fights for justice.
meanings.sent2: Standups are essential in advocating for those who cannot speak up.
meanings.sent3: The standup heroically defended the rights of the oppressed.
meanings.sent4: Being a standup means being a voice for the voiceless.
meanings.sent5: The standup's courage inspired others to stand up for what is right.

meanings.definition: A type of exercise where a person stands up and sits down repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: Doing standups helps strengthen your leg muscles.
meanings.sent2: Standups are a great way to improve your fitness level.
meanings.sent3: I feel the burn in my thighs after a round of standups.
meanings.sent4: Standups are like a mini workout for your lower body.
meanings.sent5: After a few standups, I can already feel my legs getting stronger.
